member.remarks:
回傳範例 PUT /api/v1/whs/sign Sample 1 { "FlowID":"1020200421001997001", "SignID":"002688", "SingRemark":"簽核測試_簽准_test001", "IsFinish":"1", "UpdatedBy":"002688", }
IsFinish =1 簽准 IsFinish = 3 簽退
